episodes.name: Top Cars
episodes.overview: From a farm fresh '33 Coupe to a heavy hitting Italian racecar, the guys explore their hottest automotive finds.

episodes.name: Down & Dirty Digs
episodes.overview: One man's trash is Mike and Frank's treasures as they go digging in some of the dirtiest places for rusty gold.

episodes.name: Extreme Collectors
episodes.overview: The guys meet the most unique collectors they've ever encountered, and learn that the most interesting people have the coolest stuff.

episodes.name: Super Sized Buys
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank find the biggest items they've ever picked, but getting these behemoths home is the hardest part.

episodes.name: California Gold
episodes.overview: The guys go West on a sun-soaked journey for the best nuggets the Golden State has to offer.

episodes.name: Creepiest Collections
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank face their fears as they uncover the most hair-raising items of the series.

episodes.name: Hard Bargains
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank learn it's not always easy getting what they want when they face down some of the toughest negotiators on the road.

episodes.name: Mike's Bikes
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank have the most fun possible on two wheels in this collection of the rarest bikes and motorcycles they ever picked.

episodes.name: Superhero Super Picks!
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank's spidey senses tingle when they come across the best comic book, superhero, and sci-fi memorabilia in the history of the show, including a rare Spider-Man comic book, life-size Han Solo, and the original Batmobile.

episodes.name: Wheels and Deals
episodes.overview: From a collection of rare Indian motorcycles to a one of a kind custom Volkswagen bus, Mike and Frank have a passion for anything on wheels; but are they willing to pony up the cash to get the deals done?

episodes.name: Road to Restoration
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank make good on a promise to restore a 1935 Auburn and take the original owners for a ride.

episodes.name: Frank Gone Wild
episodes.overview: Frank tries to keep his cool when he comes across items that he just can't live without.

episodes.name: Best of the West
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank head West to where the buffalo roam and the skies are not cloudy all day in search of the most perfect picks on the range.

episodes.name: Colossal Collections
episodes.overview: Big, bigger, biggest. Mike and Frank take picking to a whole new level when they come across collectors who are not afraid to go big when it comes to collecting.

episodes.name: Ain't That Americana
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank head across the USA searching for iconic items that are as American as Apple Pie and Baseball.

episodes.name: Best Bets
episodes.overview: The guys press their luck in coin flips, arm wrestling matches, and more, gambling on prices for items that are worth the risk.

episodes.name: American Treasures
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank dig through attics and barns in search of the rare items that have shaped America.

episodes.name: Fan Favorites
episodes.overview: We asked, you chose.  A collection of Favorite Picks chosen by you the viewers.

episodes.name: Collecting Cars
episodes.overview: From Volkswagens to Fords it's an oasis of cars as Mike and Frank stumble upon people with the largest collection of cars.

episodes.name: Ultimate Restorations
episodes.overview: Rusty relics becomes polished gems as Mike and Frank show off their ultimate restoration picks.

episodes.name: Wicked Pickah's
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are barnstorming New England searching for treasures from Maine to Massachusetts. Even picking a big mansion in the old money town of Newport, Rhode Island.

episodes.name: American Rarities
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank scour the country in search of "once in a lifetime" items from moments that have defined America.

episodes.name: Booms & Busts
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank play a game of chance, buying items that will either bring in big cash or be a total bust.

episodes.name: Picks of the Rich & Famous
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are asked to use their picking prowess for some rich and famous clients.

episodes.name: Weird, Wild Worlds
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank pick a giant castle, a backyard spaceship, and even an underground saloon in their search for weird wild worlds.

episodes.name: Brothers in Pick
episodes.overview: With Frank sidelined Mike and Robbie hit the road to prove that two Wolfe's are better than one.

episodes.name: Don't Mess with Texas
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank head to the Lone Star State to see if everything is bigger in Texas.

episodes.name: Double Dip Picks
episodes.overview: It's D j  vu for Mike and Frank when they return for a Double Dip trying to pick what they couldn't the first time around.

episodes.name: Rusty Gold & Rock 'n Roll
episodes.overview: Mike, Frank, and Danielle hang out with music legends and Rock N' Roll Hall of Famers when they go digging for vintage guitars, music memorabilia, and more.

episodes.name: Mike's Garage
episodes.overview: Mike's love of everything automotive is explored through these garage related picks.

episodes.name: Dani and the Boys
episodes.overview: Danielle learns the ropes and uses her wits and charm to help Mike and Frank get the prices they need on items across the U.S.

episodes.name: Unique Rides
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank get rev'd up over rides that are one of a kind.

episodes.name: Mikey Likes It
episodes.overview: The Boys are hitting the road to look for items that make Mike Wolfe howl!

episodes.name: Big Money Rides
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are on the lookout for rusty gold and are willing to fork over the money it will take to take these items home.

episodes.name: The Frank Fritz Experience
episodes.overview: Watch Frank take the lead in these picks that allow the Bearded Charmer to do what he does best.

episodes.name: War & Picks
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank hit the road in search of all things Militaria.

episodes.name: 1st Show Ever
episodes.overview: On the anniversary of the first American Pickers Show Mike and Frank take a look back at their beginnings looking for honey holes and rusty gold.

episodes.name: Crazy Collections
episodes.overview: Ancient mummies, space age automobiles, and even junk tributes to ex-lovers; these collectors have the craziest collections that Mike and Frank have ever picked through.

episodes.name: Rare Restoration
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank find some diamonds in the rough and get them polished up and restored to their former glory.

episodes.name: Games of Skill and Chance
episodes.overview: It's ax throwing, golf, billiards, and arcade games for Mike, Frank, Robbie, and Danielle when they place bets and play games on items that bring them back to their childhood.

episodes.name: Backwoods Pickin'
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank go way off road searching the backwoods for one of a kind picks.

episodes.name: Hot Rods and Customs
episodes.overview: Mike and Franks are on the hunt for Hot Rods and Classic Cars.

episodes.name: Hollywood Gold
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are star struck as they search for blockbuster movie picks.

episodes.name: We Got Gas
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank want to top off their tank with all kinds of gas station goodness.

episodes.name: Junkyard Treasures
episodes.overview: One man's junk is another man's treasure. Mike and Frank dig through America's junkyards searching for rusty gold!

episodes.name: European Vacation
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank jump across the pond to unearth the treasure England and Italy have to offer.

episodes.name: Man Cave Mania
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank search for items worthy of display in a Man Cave.

episodes.name: Father Picks Best
episodes.overview: Fathers know best when it comes to picking. Mike and Frank meet up with fellow picking families.

episodes.name: Mike's Motorcycle Club
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are cruising the country in search of the best motorcycles they can find.

episodes.name: Big Money Motors
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank take two iconic, rusted-out rat rods and transform them back into the classic American cars that they once were.

episodes.name: Hot Rod Treasures
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank hit the road, and the track, flagging down some deals on race cars and memorabilia.

episodes.name: Frank's Speed Shop
episodes.overview: Frank takes the lead looking deals on vintage and custom motorcycles.

episodes.name: Cross Country Pickin'
episodes.overview: From the city to the coast, Mike and Frank take the ultimate road trip, Picker Style!

episodes.name: Mystery Picks
episodes.overview: The box is locked and the key is missing but Mike and Frank take a chance, hoping to find some hidden treasure.

episodes.name: Junkyard Gold
episodes.overview: One man's junk is Mike and Frank's treasure as they scour junkyards in search of rusty gold.

episodes.name: Dani D Leader of the Pick
episodes.overview: Danielle hits the roads and shows Mike and Frank a thing or two about picking.

episodes.name: Deep Woods Pickin'
episodes.overview: The boys venture off the beaten path in hopes of finding deals and profit on the road less traveled.

episodes.name: Great American Rides
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are on the hunt for rare finds that define the history of the American automotive industry.

episodes.name: Ladies Pick
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank meet their match when they come up against some women who are tougher negotiators than they are.

episodes.name: Robbie to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When the guys get sidelined the picking continues when Robbie steps in to find the deals.

episodes.name: Harleys & Indians
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank come across some Iconic Harley and Indian motorcycles.

episodes.name: Most Wanted
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank find some items related to some of history's most infamous figures.

episodes.name: Pick, Trick, or Treat
episodes.overview: It's a scary time as Mike and Frank unmask some creepy collections.

episodes.name: The Road Less Picked
episodes.overview: With no planned destination, Mike and Frank find out sometimes the best finds are uncovered while freestyling.

episodes.name: Keep on Rockin'
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank uncover some rare, and valuable Rock n Roll memorabilia.

episodes.name: Lone Star Pickin'
episodes.overview: The guys hit Texas and discover what the Lone Star State has to offer.

episodes.name: Pickin' the 60s
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank find some treasures from the Summer of Love.

episodes.name: Pickin' Through the Snow
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank deal with some winter weather in their search for treasures.

episodes.name: Picks in Toyland
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank release their inner child as they uncover old toys.

episodes.name: Another Wicked Pick
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank revisit New England and hope to discover the rusty gold that may have eluded them the first time through.

episodes.name: Outer Limits Picking
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank pick a few people who may, or may not, be from another world.

episodes.name: Picking Henry Ford
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank hit the road in search of farm fresh, rusty rides manufactured by the godfather of the American auto industry, Henry Ford.

episodes.name: Hungry Hungry Pickers
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank look to fill their bellies as well as the van as they come across classic roadside dining.

episodes.name: Big Money Mansions
episodes.overview: Get your wallets out! Mike and Frank are spending big bucks looking at some of the biggest, fanciest places they've ever picked!

episodes.name: Battlefield Picks
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank scout forts and fields searching for historic military artifacts.

episodes.name: The Sport of Picking
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank take a break from the barn scene and try to hit a home run when they go looking for sport memorabilia.

episodes.name: Big Top Picks
episodes.overview: Step right up and join Mike and Frank on their travelling circus adventure as they discover the wackiest circus memorabilia on either side of the Mississippi.

episodes.name: On the Fritz
episodes.overview: Searching through the backroads of America, Frank gets excited when he realizes every pick he and Mike come upon is tailor-made specifically for him.

episodes.name: All Signs Point to Picking
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank follow the signs--large and small--them a treasure trove of advertising memorabilia.

episodes.name: Field Trip
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank run amok when they find rare relics that deserve to be on display in a museum.

episodes.name: Lil' Pickers
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank have their work cut out for them when they run into some kid pickers who drive a hard bargain and show them how well they can negotiate.

episodes.name: Battle of the Pickers
episodes.overview: It's Mike and Danielle versus Frank and Robbie to see who can fill their van first and bring in the most valuable finds.

episodes.name: Wheels of Glory
episodes.overview: From high end race cars to custom-made motorcycles, Mike and Frank are ready to jump in the front seat and drive away with some of the rarest collections they've ever seen.

episodes.name: Mikes Wheel Deals
episodes.overview: Mike looks to add to the collection when he tries to make a deal on vintage cars and bicycles.

episodes.name: Mad Mike and Furious Frank
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank take a few test drives to see who can pick the coolest car.

episodes.name: Summertime Fun
episodes.overview: The weather is warming up and Mike and Frank are looking for some cool items to fill the van.

episodes.name: Pacific Coast Picks
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank take a tour from Washington to California to uncover the treasures the Pacific coast have to offer.

episodes.name: Robbie Rides Again
episodes.overview: Sometimes even the best pickers need some help and Mike's brother is the man to help fill the van.

episodes.name: Dude Looks Like a Picker
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank uncover a piece of rock 'n' roll history as they come across Aerosmith's original van.

episodes.name: Thirsty Thirsty Pickers
episodes.overview: After clearing out dusty barns Mike and Frank look for some drink related items to quench their thirst.

episodes.name: Flyer Finds
episodes.overview: Freestyling on the road, Mike and Frank check off all the boxes on their flyer as they pick some real treasures.

episodes.name: Dani 3D
episodes.overview: Dani and Mike combine for star power picking and find rare Beatles and Evel Knievel items.

episodes.name: Off the Grid
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank meet some interesting characters whose collections are even more far out and ripe for picking.

episodes.name: More Wicked Pickin'
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank return to their favorite part of the country to pick more of New England's rich history.

episodes.name: Picks of the 3rd Kind
episodes.overview: Rockets! Rayguns! Robots! Mike and Frank have a blast encountering out of this world picks.

episodes.name: FrankenFritz and the Wolfeman
episodes.overview: On the creepiest, spookiest and kookiest night of the year, Mike and Frank come across a collector with a taste for high voltage oddities.

episodes.name: Cars! Cars! Cars!
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank put the pedal to the picking metal in this non-stop car picking spectacular.

episodes.name: A Hard Day's Pick
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank's skills are put to the test when they come across a bunch of tough negotiators.

episodes.name: Gaming Gold
episodes.overview: Its Game On for Mike and Frank when they score an 80s inspired arcade of jackpot picks and a super-rare, horse racing game that Mike bets is a winner!

episodes.name: Blockbuster Buys
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are on a nationwide hunt for the hottest movie memorabilia that Hollywood has forgotten.

episodes.name: Garage Gold
episodes.overview: Mike gets a case of bad-to-the-bone Fairlane Fever and he also goes back to the future in a Dolorean with Dani when the Pickers chase Garage Gold.

episodes.name: Barnyard Bling
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank blow the doors off of America's barns searching for some farm fresh picking folklore.

episodes.name: Big Dollar Days
episodes.overview: Mike stumbles upon a one-of-a kind '39 Cadillac Madam X with a steep price tag. Will he be able to resist? Meanwhile Frank puts it all on the line for a pair of Indian motorcycles. And later in the show, Mike tries to make the math work on collection of vintage motorcycles. Will the boys go big or go home?

episodes.name: Beg Borrow Pick
episodes.overview: Mike makes a perfect trade, scoring a motor for his 1911 Indian. He and Frank have a ball, trading and swapping their way across the country.

episodes.name: Picks of the Sea
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank dive into a treasure hunt of picks from the sea. Dani goes after a gem from the Amazon and Robbie haggles for nautical gold with the Captain of a tugboat.

episodes.name: The Big Fix
episodes.overview: Mike and his crew of experts attempt to pull off impossible restorations no others would attempt. Picking this fun should be illegal.

episodes.name: Lil Riches
episodes.overview: The cash is flying when Mike and Frank go pickin' smalls with Big Prices and Big Profits.

episodes.name: Big Pickin'
episodes.overview: The fellas are on a mission for one-of-a-kind, super-sized finds. An eight-foot boot! A full-sized motor home!  But--will they fit in the van"

episodes.name: We Are Family
episodes.overview: It's a Pickin' family when Mike and Frank combine with Dani, Robbie, Dave, Mefford and Jersey John to transform an Indian into motorcycle gold.

episodes.name: Frank's Fabulous Finds
episodes.overview: Freestyling in PA, the boys meet Satch who owns some pricey vintage bikes. When Satch takes a shine to Frank, can he turn on the charm to cut a good deal'

episodes.name: Man Cave Heaven
episodes.overview: Feast your eyes on the most amazing Man Cave Picks of all time! Mike and Frank strap on their pickin' boots and go deep into Man Cave Country diggin' for rusty gold.

episodes.name: Dr. Picker
episodes.overview: The boys have an appointment with the doctor.

episodes.name: Motorcycle Gold
episodes.overview: A smokin' widowmaker, vintage Knucklehead and rare Indian are just some of the hot, wild rides for Mike in this episode.

episodes.name: Wild West Gold
episodes.overview: Saddle up pilgrims for the rarest, wildest, and most explosive picks ever to come out of the "Old West". Mike and Frank stick to their guns as they ride deep into dangerous territory for the glory of finding that rusty WILD WEST GOLD!

episodes.name: High Octane Pickin'
episodes.overview: The pickin' gods are smiling on Mike and Frank when they strike petrol-iana gold cruising the backroads of the Midwest.

episodes.name: Pickin' the 70s
episodes.overview: Dig out your bell bottoms, get out the disco ball. Join Mike and Frank on a far-out trip back to the '70's. It's muscle cars meets rock n' roll and Grizzly Adams takes on the force.

episodes.name: 4 Wheel Gold
episodes.overview: Mike and Dani hit the jackpot in an old barn where they find not one, but two Deloreans and take a once-in-a lifetime joyride back to the future.

episodes.name: Best Picks Ever!
episodes.overview: Rare, Rusty and Priceless equals Best Pick Ever! Roll through the memories with Mike and Frank as we take a look back at their best one of a kind picks of all time.

episodes.name: Veteran Valor
episodes.overview: A salute to our veterans as we share the most elite collections owned by vets of the greatest military in the world; THE US ARMED FORCES! If you love America, tanks, bikes, cars and all the  glorious rusty gold in between, don't turn the channel! To all those who served THANK YOU FOR YOUR SERVICE!

episodes.name: Road Trip Gold
episodes.overview: Gas up the van and pack the cooler on this cross country tour du force of historic Route 66.  Buckle up with Mike and Frank as they cruise the country for rusty roadside Americana that made this country as good as gold.

episodes.name: Dani D Delivers the Goods
episodes.overview: Dani D is wheelin' and dealin' her way across the country, but will she deliver the goods for Picker pals Mike, Frank and Robbie?

episodes.name: Wheel Treasures
episodes.overview: Bikes, Cycles and scooters, oh my. Mike digs deep and heads into the rafters to uncover a honeyhole of rare bicycles. Later the guys meet the ultimate chopper king, a tough negotiator with enough spare parts to outfit a rare ride, but will he spare the parts?

episodes.name: America's Funniest Picks
episodes.overview: Kick back, relax, and get ready for a barrel of laughs. Watch as Mike and Frank take you on an uproarious journey of playful picks and pranks.

episodes.name: Bootleg Bonanza
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank work up a thirst when they meet collectors of rare beer and wine finds. Cheers!

episodes.name: Wild and Wacky Picks
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank head east to discover fantastic finds from fast talking Jacky Hollywood whose auto body creations are true works of art. And Mike can't help falling in love with a life-size sculpture of Elvis. Will he make a deal or return to sender?

episodes.name: Show Me the Money
episodes.overview: It's the holy grail of VW buses, but are Mike and Frank willing to spend big bucks to overhaul this unicorn? Then on their next find, they meet Norm, owner of a jaw-dropping collection of vintage pedal cars. Are they ready to show him the money?

episodes.name: It's Always Sunny in Picksylvania
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank scour the Keystone state in search of unique characters with one-of-a-kind finds. First stop is a jam-packed warehouse/mancave where they come across an ultra-rare Spiderman comic book. Next they meet Leo, a tailor with a surprisingly amount of antique rarities and Morgan, a mad scientist with some explosively interesting items. The sun always shines when the guys are in Picksylvania.

episodes.name: Sports Car Dreams
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are on the search for the coolest cars they can find! But will their sports car dreams come true, or will it become a picker's nightmare?

episodes.name: Auburned, Over and Out
episodes.overview: Mike takes a gamble on a diamond in the rough 1935 Auburn, then spruces it up for a hair raising 600-mile journey with Dani. Mefford and Mike hone in on a smokin' hot '64 Chevy and rev up for a high-speed joyride in a badass muscle car without brakes--the one and only Superbird.

episodes.name: Deep Down Dirty Digs
episodes.overview: Mike and his entire team get back to their roots diving deeper and getting even dirtier as they scour through miles and acres of junk. From a 1932 car that's barely ever seen the light of day to a shed with a roof that about to fall down, these pickers just might walk away with treasure and not trash.

episodes.name: Greetings From The Sunshine State
episodes.overview: Looking to escape the cold of winter, the boys head to Florida for some fun in the sun; Mike and Medford hone in on a rare 1956 Cadillac.

episodes.name: Pickin with Jersey Jon
episodes.overview: Mike and Jersey Jon go on an East Coast picking bonanza at a century-old Connecticut print shop and unearth a 1922 Indian engine buried in a Cape Cod garage; later, the big money deals are flying in North Carolina like a rare Lambretta scooter.

episodes.name: Superhero Picks
episodes.overview: Mike The Mega Picker and Frank The Bundler channel their inner superheroes in a quest to land some of the most sought-after superhero memorabilia of all time.

episodes.name: Southern Fried Picks
episodes.overview: The Pickers travel off the beaten path to find some down-home country picks that include a Nashville collection from a legendary bluegrass fiddler; they might score big on a grand Southern Belle gem or hit the dusty road empty handed.

episodes.name: Super Best + Wheels
episodes.overview: A look at the guys most over-the-top best wheels picks of all time, from Aerosmiths original tour van to a Beetle perched on top of a haystack.

episodes.name: Red, White and Blue Pickin'
episodes.overview: The Pickers celebrate Americana when Mike finds the world's most famous hamburger icon in a Massachusetts chicken farm, and Frank goes nuts for a century-old Mr. Peanut. Dani and Robbie unearth a 1936 hidden Harley from an all-American barn in Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Magnificent Motors
episodes.overview: The Pickers share some of their best four wheel finds from California to Pennsylvania including a Cadillac treasure trove, a vintage Impala that they give new life and finally some wacky and classic rides in San Francisco.

episodes.name: Dani Rides Again
episodes.overview: No longer a pickin' newbie Dani brings Mike to meet Stu and his collection of 4,000 concert t-shirts. Will this be their ticket to ride or be stalled at the gate?

episodes.name: Brofest
episodes.overview: It's a bro-fest when brothers Mike and Robbie pick vintage cars and trucks in upstate New York. The bro-fest continues at a brewery where it's big cash for motorcycle owned by twin brothers.

episodes.name: Heaping Honeyholes
episodes.overview: The guys hit the road to dig through some of the most jam-packed, overflowing, stacked-to-the-ceiling honeyholes of all time. Will they be able to score some rusty gold, or will they find themselves at the bottom of a junk-a-lanche?

episodes.name: Rockstar Pickin'
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are completely blown away when they cross paths with Rock N' Roll music legends and go digging deep for one of a kind music memorabilia.

episodes.name: Salty & Sweet Pickins'
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are hungry for some salty and sweet pickin's! In North Carolina, Mike finds himself bargaining with a man who never sells anything for an incredibly rare Mountain Dew statue. Then in Louisiana, the guys discover a never-before-seen, century-old Jell-O ice cream wagon.

episodes.name: Super Secret Treasures
episodes.overview: Sometimes, the best treasure is the kind you have to hunt for.

episodes.name: Can't Stop Picking
episodes.overview: Mike and Frank are picking through a mancave that hasn't been touched since the 70s. Will they turn the pick around or will it become a disco inferno?

episodes.name: Super Best Bizarre Picks
episodes.overview: Get ready for the whacky, weird, and wild as Mike and Frank embark on one of their most bizarre journeys yet. First, the guys meet Josh with a world of wonders along with two-headed calves, six-legged cows, pickled pigs, and a wax Elvis statue. Then, it's time for some freestyling in Kansas for a giant cowboy boot. Next up are two carnie legends with shrunken heads, creepy clowns, and the wolf boy. Finally, at an old honky-tonk, it's their doppelgangers. Two huge Laurel and Hardy heads that Mike and Frank get for a steal.

episodes.name: Ridin High
episodes.overview: Its RESTORATION TIME when two high end cars roll into the shop. First up is a one of a kind 1940 Lincoln Zephyr that Mike has his eyes on after digging it out of a century old barn. But will the newest member of the gang Mike Mefford be able to add his magic touch or will this restoration go up in smoke? And later, the team goes on the hunt for the legendary 1929 Cadillac known as Madam X. Can they pull off the deal of a lifetime or will the journey to buy, restore end in disaster?

episodes.name: Frank Almighty
episodes.overview: The time is now, its finally here, the day we pay homage to the one and only, Frank Fritz. Get ready while we take you on a fun ride filled with Franks funniest moments and best buys. First, the boys head to West Virginia to pick a toy museum and Frank can barely contain his excitement. Next, Frank is head over heels when he gets to pick through the drummers house from one of his favorite bands Ohio Express. Later, Frank finds his moment of Zen when he meets up with the Clock King of Oregon where tik tok Frank comes alive. Finally, will Frank get to keep his beard or will the bearded charmer be no more.

episodes.name: Jersey In The House
episodes.overview: Look outJersey is in the HOUSE! In South Carolina, Jersey and Mike find hidden treasures in a collapsed barn they call a death trap and later unearth a barn-fresh 1932 pickup that hasnt seen the light of day in 40 years.

episodes.name: Bizarre Cars
episodes.overview: Mike, Frank and Dani are in for a wild and wacky ride when they come across some really eclectic, one-of-a-kind vehicles that are extremely rare and essentially priceless.

episodes.name: Coin Flippin Picking
episodes.overview: The guys encounter Preston who likes to gamble for prices, even at his own expense. And later Mike flips a coin for a rare cycle car, will it be heads he wins or tails he loses?

episodes.name: Dani Does It All
episodes.overview: Danielle is challenged by Mike and Frank to sell some unusual items; her request for a raise forces the guys to consider how valuable she is to the team.

episodes.name: Paranormal Pickin
episodes.overview: Mike, Frank and Danielle pick some of the most haunted honeyholes in America, from a penitentiary with a paranormal prisoner to an abandoned house with an apparitional aunt; will they make it out with some rusty gold, or will some ghoulish ghosts run them off?

episodes.name: Family Style Pickin
episodes.overview: Its Family Style Pickin when Mike and Frank meet Bobby, whose beloved biker Dad had a 35-year motorcycle collection including a 36 Knucklehead engine. Mike is left speechless when he sees a staggering collection of A-list mannequins owned by twin brothers, Tom and Joe, who learned everything they know about picking from Dad.

episodes.name: Saints And Sinners
episodes.overview: Gear up as the exceptional and honorable take on the lewd and mischievous in this battle between Saints and Sinners. Follow along with the cast on their search for the risque yet rewarding picks.

episodes.name: East vs. West: Which Picks Are Best?
episodes.overview: From the beaches of California to the busy streets of New York City, Mike and Frank travel from sea to shining sea. Its East Coast vs. West Coast. Find out which picks are best!

episodes.name: Big City Big Picks
episodes.overview: It's Big Picks in the Big City for Mike and Frank when fast-talking Jackie from NYC unveils his incredible body shop and rips through hilarious stories. During a Cleveland mega-pick, Mike and Dave clear out a pair of turbo go-karts and a red-hot Chevy. Then, the boys hit the South Side of Chicago where a colossal machine shop leaves them breathless.

episodes.name: Crazy Creations
episodes.overview: The Pickers stumble across some of the craziest creations ever! Dr. Evermors Forevertron, designed for intergalactic travel, the legendary Michigan Mans powerful V-8 bikes, an ultra-rare vintage Edison fan, and in one of the most eccentric homes the guys have ever seena dragon and a creepy naked Santa.

episodes.name: Picks on the Wild Side
episodes.overview: It's a jungle out there for Mike and Frank as they hit the road for rusty gold! From an animal kingdom collection to an encounter with an emu, pig, and donkey...it's not just the possibility of a deal falling through that they have to look out for.

episodes.name: Waves and Wheels
episodes.overview: Surf's up in this thrilling episode of "Waves & Wheels" as Mike and Frank journey across the country unearthing a treasure trove of aquatic and automotive history.

episodes.name: Off the Pickin' Track
episodes.overview: When Mike and Frank take a deep dive into the woods looking for rusty gold, they may come to realize that they'll find more than what they bargained for.

episodes.name: Eclectic & Electric
episodes.overview: Join Mike, Frank, Dani, and Rob on a rollicking ride through the weirdest and wackiest gadgets ever uncovered on their picking excursions. From the first pinball machine with flappers to a dangerously high voltage demonstration, this episode explores the eccentric and unearths some utterly unique machinery.

episodes.name: Car-Tastic Picks
episodes.overview: The odometer keeps rolling as the pickers crisscross the nation, burning rubber from one massive car collection to the next, hunting for the hottest horsepower on four wheels. Ride along as they rummage through rare rust, awe over original paint, and dicker their way through a highway of rusty gold.

episodes.name: Timeless Picks
episodes.overview: Tick tock, the clock never stops. From the Midwest to the Southeast, the boys uncover timepiece gems in every corner of the USA. They dig up some 1950's automobilia clocks from an old moonshine farm and pick a sexy Airmaid Nylons stockings clock, adorned with the amusing tagline "Every hour of the day!"

episodes.name: Southern Wheels
episodes.overview: When winter comes, the boys go...down south, y'all! On this southern extravaganza, the pickers are searching for rare car collectibles and colourful characters, and boy, are they successful! A 1934 Cabriolet, a 1967 Shelby Mustang, a 1950s Rocket 88 Engine, a 1974 Karmann Ghia, and more are all found in the barns, backyards, and backwoods of America's great southern states!

episodes.name: The Rare, the Rough, and the Shiny
episodes.overview: All across America people have been passionately collecting anything and everything that speaks to them. Follow Mike and Frank as they traverse collections of all conditions hoping to find rare, rough, or shiny artefacts they can turn into big profits.

episodes.name: Quest for the Holy Grail
episodes.overview: Frank learns Knucklehead Zen in California when the guys visit an international man of mystery. In a Maryland basement, Frank becomes obsessed with and offers big money for a 1939 Plymouth Coupe the owner doesn't seem to want to part with. Frank breaks a sweat and the bank in Massachusetts when he uncovers the holy grail of oilcans. Frank pays big money to a Wisconsin photographer for an oversized Mississippi Riverboat relic but gets a sinking feeling when he gets it appraised back home. Finally, Frank wants to attend his high school reunion and show off his new ride, but it's never easy.

episodes.name: Heartland Picks
episodes.overview: Buckle up as the Antique Archaeology team combs through the Midwest searching for rare local rusty gold from the Heartland of America.

episodes.name: Grand Slam Picks
episodes.overview: In Chicago, Mike and Frank find a warehouse filled with superstar sports memorabilia that are a total slam dunk. In Kansas, Mike combs through a stockpile to uncover a stash of baseball cards worth a fortune. Just outside the nation's capital Mike and Frank find a gold mine of untouched inventory from one of the country's oldest sporting goods store. Then, Danielle surprises Mike with a major league event complete with a Hollywood ending.

episodes.name: Superstar Picks
episodes.overview: Danielle and the guys grab some superstar picks for legendary country singer Dolly Parton at her Dollywood theme park. Then, will Mike and Frank walk away with a priceless piece of rock'n'roll history after meeting Cheap Trick guitarist Rick Nielsen, or will they surrender?
